triples.name: Vertebrate
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes populations of vertebrate animal species as indicators of mass extinction

triples.name: Holocene extinction
triples.relevance: The sixth mass extinction discussed is the Holocene extinction caused by human activity

triples.name: Extinction event
triples.relevance: Mass extinction events are the central phenomenon being studied in this paper

triples.name: Biodiversity
triples.relevance: Regional biodiversity collapse is discussed as a consequence of species extinction

triples.name: Ecosystem
triples.relevance: Species interactions within ecosystems are analyzed as critical links in ecosystem function

triples.name: Endangered species
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on critically endangered vertebrate species and their population losses
